revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Mansion |image = [[File:Pokemon Mansion.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokémon Mansion. |tokens = 1,500 |location = West of Cinnabar Island. }} The '''Pokémon Mansion''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 17,760 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Ratatta || [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Johnson || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- |[[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || [[File:Burglar.png|40px]] Burglar Arnie || [[File:Charmander.png|40px]] Charmander, [[File:Charmeleon.png|40px]] Charmeleon |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix || [[File:Burglar.png|40px]] Burglar Simon || [[File:Ninetales.png|40px]] Ninetales |- | [[File:Growlithe.png|40px]] Growlithe || [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Braydon || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton, [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb |- | [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer || [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Ted || [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode, [[File:Weezing.png|40px]] Weezing |- | [[File:Muk.png|40px]] Muk || rowspan=2|[[File:Burglar.png|40px]] Burglar Lewis || rowspan=2|[[File:Growlithe.png|40px]] Growlithe, [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Weezing.png|40px]] Weezing || rowspan=2|[[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Ivan || rowspan=2| [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite, [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode |- | [[File:Ditto.png|40px]] Ditto |- |}

==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 49.98% || 48.00% || 40.00% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.00% || 20.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Figy}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 3.99% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Figy}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
